context: <user> I really like sci fi novels and especially the ones that have been made into movies, how about you? <system> I enjoy a good sci fi movie once in a while. <user> There's so many themes, do you know The Twilight Zone? <system> I do know The Twilight Zone. <user> Oh great, The twilight Zone was always on at about 2am in the morning I used to stay up to watch it when I was a kid! <system> I watched it on the weekends. <user> Yeah it was a bit late to get up for school, it was created by Rod Serling he narrated it. <system> I remember reading about Rod Serling.<user> Yeah he was an American screenwriter, did lots of work in the 1950s. <system>
